ygData.subject: Re: What's wrong with you people?
ygData.msgSnippet: At 11:02 AM 5/20/99 -0700, you wrote: The deal quite frankly is thsi. I can t play with my friends because theya re all outleveling me. When theya re online I
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:02 AM 5/20/99 -0700, you wrote:

The deal quite frankly is thsi. I can't play with my friends because theya
re all outleveling me. When theya re online I play with them even though
theya re 3-4 levles ahead of me and even though sometimes I am zero use to
them because none of my spells stick. When they are offline I cannot findany
groups to play so I am stuck attempting to solo which is incredibly slow and
dangerous too. This is the Second Wave of friends that has out leveled me.


>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>I had a level 16 dark elf necro that I started on the first day of the
>release. It took me 4 'played' days and a half to get it to level 16. then I
>gave it up. I have now a level 16 enchanter. It took me 12 'played' days to
>make it to 16... You think that's a problem for me? I had so much more fun
>playing an enchanter. What's the deal with this level race? Sometimes I'll
>spend an hour travelling back and forth just to say hi to a friend I havent
>seen for a long time. Right now, I'm hunting in CrushBone and I barely make
>any xp where I could be soloing in Lavastorm and make a shit load of xp and
>money..but what's the big deal? I enjoy playing Everquest a lot more now.
>Powergaming is so boring. So are those people who start a race everytime a
>new server comes up.
>
>my 2 cents,
>Skara
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
>http://www.onelist.com
>Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
>
>
--
